function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Prohibited waste sorting in buildings with SARS-CoV-2 positive or suspected subjects","Impact":"Potential risk of unsorted contaminated waste leading to the spread of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Implementation of safe waste handling protocols and specialized waste treatment for contaminated materials","Technologies":"Digital and smart devices for waste collection monitoring, automated vacuum waste collection systems","People":"Residents in buildings with SARS-CoV-2 positive or suspected subjects","Owner":"Local authorities, waste management organizations"},{"Description":"Dissemination of returnable waste practices","Impact":"Reduction of waste and potential contamination, especially in densely built-up contexts","Mitigation":"Education and promotion of returnable waste practices, proper waste management infrastructure","Technologies":"Returnable waste programs, smart waste bins","People":"Urban residents and communities","Owner":"Local authorities, waste management organizations"},{"Description":"Replacement of regular bins with smart bins for continuous monitoring","Impact":"Improved waste collection efficiency, especially in public spaces","Mitigation":"Deployment of smart waste monitoring technology, regular maintenance and management of smart bins","Technologies":"Smart waste bins, waste collection monitoring systems","People":"Urban residents and communities, waste management organizations","Owner":"Local authorities, waste management organizations"}]}
